songs.title: Ride Out The Storm
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Murda on da beat so it's not nice

[Chorus: Quavo]
Dreams go far like fireworks
Dreams go far like fireworks
We can be stars in the universe
We can be stars in the universe, yeah
Let's practice our future just like when we were herts, yeah
And I don't wanna lose you, don't think my heart can't hurt, yeah
Got that spark in your eyes like fireworks
If you ever walk out my life, I gotta search

[Post-Chorus: Quavo]
Straight out the rain, we gon' ride out the storm (Yeah)
Go through the pain, we gon' ride out the storm (Yeah)
Straight out the rain, we gon' ride out the storm (Yeah)
Go through the pain, we gon' ride out the storm (Yeah)

[Refrain: Quavo]
Ride out the storm
Ride out the storm (Yeah)
Ride out the storm
Ride out the storm

[Chorus: Quavo]
Dreams go far like fireworks
Dreams go far like fireworks
We can be stars in the universe
We can be stars in the universe, yeah
Let's practice our future just like when we were herts, yeah
And I don't wanna lose you, don't think my heart can't hurt, yeah
Got that spark in your eyes like fireworks
If you ever walk out my life, I gotta search

[Refrain: Quavo]
Ride out the storm
Ride out the storm (Yeah)
Ride out the storm
Ride out the storm
